requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
              
              •	Knowledge in Ruby (1.9+) programming language.
              
              •	Strong Ruby on Rails (3+) knowledge.
              
              •	MVC programming.
              
              •	Experience with MySQL.
              
              •	Knowledge in JavaScript programming language.
              
              •	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
              
              •	Experience with jQuery, ExtJS JavaScript library.
              
              •	Knowledge in Linux operating systems.
              
              •	Experience with SVN repository.
              
              •	Familiar with agile development methodologies (Scrum).
              
              •	Excellent analytical and problem solving abilities with strong attention to detail.
              

              * Advantages:
              
              •	Good English skill.
              
              •	Creativity.
              
              •	Problem solving skill, working under pressure.
              
              •	Experience in system architecture design.
              
              •	Experience in common third-party APIs (Google, Facebook, Amazon etc)
              
              •	Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git, SVN
              
              •	Knowledge of common open source tools.
              
              •	Possibility to start work soon.
              

              WHY YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE
              
              * Working at EdgeWorks:
              
              •	Working in an international, friendly, active and challenging environment
              
              •	Learn new technologies
              
              •	Skill development
              
              •	Improve your English skills
              
              •	Working time: + 8:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. (including 1,5 hour lunch & rest break) + Monday to Friday
              

              * Benefits:
              
              •	Competitive salary (up to $2000)
              
              •	Salary review every year based on employee’s performance and contribution
              
              •	13th month bonus; Bonus subject based on staff performance
              
              •	Company trip once a year + Team-building activities
              
              •	1-2 day(s) off for Christmas holiday
              
              •	Employee's birthday, Company's birthday, Christmas and Year-end parties
              
              •	Company's gift for employees (on Lunar New Year, Mid-Autumn Festival...)
              
              •	Company’s labor policy completely pursuant to Vietnamese labor legislation (social & health insurance, annual leave, working conditions, etc.)
              
              •	Build your stable career with dynamic promotion and job opportunities
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
